item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 3, 2025 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:

3. I maintain a 17 year old ThinkPad (416 points | 367 comments)

22. Tell HN: Announcing tomhow as a public moderator (1704 points | 442 comments)

27. Restructuring Announcement (230 points | 199 comments)
